faq-one-content: Great news! In 2023, shipping from overseas to the USA has significantly improved, leading to faster delivery times for your items. Once your order is packaged and ready to go, you can expect your items to arrive at your doorstep within a reasonable timeframe of 5-12 business days. This reduced shipping duration ensures that you can receive your products promptly and enjoy your purchases without unnecessary delays. Happy shopping!
faq-two-content: We do not generally accept returns, unless there is a mistake in the order fulfillment on our end.
faq-three-title: What shoe size should I get?
faq-three-content: When considering shoe sizes, it's important to note that they tend to run slightly smaller. To ensure a comfortable fit, especially for those with wider feet, we advise opting for a size that's 1/2 to a full size larger than your regular measurement.
faq-four-title: Does clothes come true to size?
faq-four-content: When it comes to clothing, sizing can often be on the smaller side. To guarantee a well-fitting garment, we suggest selecting a size one notch higher than your usual choice. For instance, if you typically wear a Small, we recommend considering a Medium for the ideal fit.
